title: Implement TestVerifier and BuildVerifier
acceptance_criteria:
1. NewTestVerifier uses config.TestCommand when set
2. NewTestVerifier falls back to detected.TestCommand
3. NewTestVerifier returns nil when no command available
4. Same behavior for NewBuildVerifier with build commands
5. Verifiers correctly inherit CommandVerifier behavior
6. Name() returns "test" or "build" appropriately
7. All unit tests pass
